definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: This paper presented a method of extracting drawing order from static handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种提取静态字体笔顺信息的方法。

sentences.english: "Bi Shun " has the meaning of thinking of writing is going on smoothly and without obstacles.
sentences.chinese: 笔顺就是写作思路顺畅，没有障碍的意思。

sentences.english: The normalization of Chinese character stroke orders is a fundamental project in language modernization.
sentences.chinese: 汉字笔顺规范是语文现代化建设的一个基础项目。

sentences.english: To write the correct characters, learn the rules of the strokes will be very important.
sentences.chinese: 我们要学笔顺规则，这样才能写出正确的汉字。

definition: vertical stroke with a hook at the end (in Chinese characters)
component of a Chinese character (as the radical or the phonetic part)
new character (in textbook)/character that is unfamiliar or not yet studied
against the bristles (brush movement in painting)
horizontal stroke with a hook at the end (in Chinese characters)
style of writing (literary style)/way of writing a character/spelling
stroke count (number of brushstrokes of a Chinese character)
character with two or more readings
